00030 void SetEditorItemsTaskbarMode( UINT16 usNewMode )
00031 {
00032       UnclickEditorButtons( ITEMS_WEAPONS, ITEMS_KEYS );
00033       switch( usNewMode )
00034       {
00035             case ITEMS_WEAPONS:
00036                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_WEAPONS );
00037                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS;
00038                   break;
00039             case ITEMS_AMMO:
00040                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_AMMO );
00041                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_AMMO;
00042                   break;
00043             case ITEMS_ARMOUR:
00044                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_ARMOUR );
00045                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_ARMOUR;
00046                   break;
00047             case ITEMS_EXPLOSIVES:
00048                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_EXPLOSIVES );
00049                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EXPLOSIVES;
00050                   break;
00051             case ITEMS_EQUIPMENT1:
00052                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_EQUIPMENT1 );
00053                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT1;
00054                   break;
00055             case ITEMS_EQUIPMENT2:
00056                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_EQUIPMENT2 );
00057                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT2;
00058                   break;
00059             case ITEMS_EQUIPMENT3:
00060                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_EQUIPMENT3 );
00061                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT3;
00062                   break;
00063             case ITEMS_TRIGGERS:
00064                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_TRIGGERS );
00065                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS;
00066                   break;
00067             case ITEMS_KEYS:
00068                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_KEYS );
00069                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS;
00070                   break;
00071       }
00072 }

00074 #define NO_EFFECT             2

00076 void SetEditorBuildingTaskbarMode( UINT16 usNewMode )
00077 {
00078       BOOLEAN fNewGroup = FALSE;
00079       BOOLEAN fNewRoofs, fNewWalls, fNewRoomInfo;
00080       if( usNewMode == usCurrentMode )
00081       {
00082             ClickEditorButton( usNewMode );
00083             return;
00084       }
00085       usCurrentMode = usNewMode;
00086       //Unclick all of the building section buttons first -- except the view modes.
00087       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_WALLS );
00088       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_DOORS );
00089       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_WINDOWS );
00090       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_ROOFS );
00091       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_BROKEN_WALLS );
00092       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_FURNITURE );
00093       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_DECALS );
00094       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_FLOORS );
00095       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_PLACE_TOILETS );
00096       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_SMART_WALLS );
00097       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_SMART_DOORS );
00098       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_SMART_WINDOWS );
00099       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS );
00100       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_DOORKEY );
00101       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM );
00102       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_NEW_ROOF );
00103       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_CAVE_DRAWING );
00104       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_SAW_ROOM );
00105       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_KILL_BUILDING );
00106       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_COPY_BUILDING );
00107       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_MOVE_BUILDING );
00108       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_DRAW_ROOMNUM );
00109       ClickEditorButton( usNewMode );
00110 
00111       gfRenderDrawingMode = TRUE;
00112 
00113       //Clicking on certain buttons will automatically activate/deactive certain views.
00114       switch( usNewMode )
00115       {
00116             case BUILDING_KILL_BUILDING://Show everything
00117                   fNewWalls = TRUE;
00118                   fNewRoofs = TRUE;
00119                   fNewRoomInfo = TRUE;
00120                   break;
00121             case BUILDING_NEW_ROOF:
00122             case BUILDING_PLACE_ROOFS:
00123                   fNewWalls = TRUE;
00124                   fNewRoofs = TRUE;
00125                   fNewRoomInfo = FALSE;
00126                   break;
00127             case BUILDING_DRAW_ROOMNUM: //Show room info
00128             case BUILDING_ERASE_ROOMNUM: //Show room info
00129                   fNewWalls = NO_EFFECT;
00130                   fNewRoofs = gfBasement ? TRUE : FALSE;
00131                   fNewRoomInfo = TRUE;
00132                   break;
00133             case BUILDING_PLACE_DOORS:
00134             case BUILDING_PLACE_WINDOWS:
00135             case BUILDING_PLACE_WALLS:
00136             case BUILDING_PLACE_BROKEN_WALLS:
00137             case BUILDING_PLACE_FLOORS:
00138             case BUILDING_PLACE_TOILETS:
00139             case BUILDING_PLACE_FURNITURE:
00140             case BUILDING_PLACE_DECALS:   
00141             case BUILDING_SMART_WALLS:
00142             case BUILDING_SMART_DOORS:
00143             case BUILDING_SMART_WINDOWS:
00144             case BUILDING_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:
00145             case BUILDING_DOORKEY:
00146             case BUILDING_SAW_ROOM:
00147             case BUILDING_NEW_ROOM:
00148             case BUILDING_COPY_BUILDING:
00149             case BUILDING_MOVE_BUILDING:
00150             case BUILDING_CAVE_DRAWING:
00151                   fNewRoofs = gfBasement ? TRUE : FALSE;
00152                   fNewWalls = TRUE;
00153                   fNewRoomInfo = FALSE;
00154                   if( usNewMode == BUILDING_PLACE_FLOORS )
00155                         gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00156                   break;
00157             default:
00158                   return;
00159       }
00160       UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_INFO_VIEW );
00161       if( fNewWalls != NO_EFFECT && fNewWalls != fBuildingShowWalls )
00162       {
00163             if( fNewWalls )
00164                   ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
00165             else
00166                   UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
00167             fBuildingShowWalls = fNewWalls;
00168             UpdateWallsView();
00169       }
00170       if( fNewRoofs != NO_EFFECT && fNewRoofs != fBuildingShowRoofs )
00171       {
00172             if( fNewRoofs )
00173                   ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
00174             else
00175                   UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
00176             fBuildingShowRoofs = fNewRoofs;
00177             UpdateRoofsView();
00178       }
00179       if( fNewRoomInfo != NO_EFFECT && fNewRoomInfo != fBuildingShowRoomInfo )
00180       {
00181             if( fNewRoomInfo )
00182                   ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_INFO_VIEW );
00183             else
00184                   UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_INFO_VIEW );
00185             fBuildingShowRoomInfo = fNewRoomInfo;
00186             gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
00187       }
00188 }

00190 void SetEditorTerrainTaskbarMode( UINT16 usNewMode )
00191 {
00192       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
00193       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_BGROUND_TEXTURES );
00194       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_CLIFFS );
00195       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_DEBRIS );
00196       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_TREES );
00197       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_ROCKS );
00198       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_MISC );
00199       UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FILL_AREA );
00200       TerrainTileDrawMode=0;
00201 
00202       gfRenderDrawingMode = TRUE;
00203 
00204       switch( usNewMode )
00205       {
00206             case TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES:
00207                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_FOREGROUND;
00208                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
00209                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_GROUND;
00210                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00211                   break;
00212             case TERRAIN_BGROUND_TEXTURES:
00213                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_BACKGROUND;
00214                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_BGROUND_TEXTURES );
00215                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_NEW_GROUND;
00216                   break;
00217             case TERRAIN_PLACE_CLIFFS:
00218                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_CLIFFS );
00219                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_BANKS;
00220                   break;
00221             case TERRAIN_PLACE_ROADS:
00222                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_ROADS );
00223                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROADS;
00224                   break;
00225             case TERRAIN_PLACE_DEBRIS:
00226                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_DEBRIS );
00227                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS;
00228                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00229                   break;
00230             case TERRAIN_PLACE_TREES:
00231                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_TREES );
00232                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS;
00233                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00234                   break;
00235             case TERRAIN_PLACE_ROCKS:
00236                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_ROCKS );
00237                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1;
00238                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00239                   break;
00240             case TERRAIN_PLACE_MISC:
00241                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_MISC );
00242                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2;
00243                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00244                   break;
00245             case TERRAIN_FILL_AREA:
00246                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FILL_AREA );
00247                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA + DRAW_MODE_GROUND;
00248                   TerrainTileDrawMode=1;
00249                   break;
00250       }
00251 }
00252 
00253 void ShowExitGrids()
00254 {
00255       UINT16 i;
00256       LEVELNODE *pLevelNode;
00257       if( gfShowExitGrids )
00258             return;
00259       gfShowExitGrids = TRUE;
00260       for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
00261       {
00262             if( GetExitGridLevelNode( i, &pLevelNode ) )
00263             {
00264                   AddTopmostToTail( i, FIRSTPOINTERS8 );
00265             }
00266       }
00267 }
00268 
00269 void HideExitGrids()
00270 {
00271       UINT16 i;
00272       LEVELNODE *pLevelNode;
00273       if( !gfShowExitGrids )
00274             return;
00275       gfShowExitGrids = FALSE;
00276       for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
00277       {
00278             if( GetExitGridLevelNode( i, &pLevelNode ) )
00279             {
00280                   pLevelNode = gpWorldLevelData[ i ].pTopmostHead;
00281                   while( pLevelNode )
00282                   {
00283                         if( pLevelNode->usIndex == FIRSTPOINTERS8 )
00284                         {
00285                               RemoveTopmost( i, pLevelNode->usIndex );
00286                               break;
00287                         }
00288                         pLevelNode = pLevelNode->pNext;
00289                   }
00290             }
00291       }
00292 }
00293 
00294 void SetEditorMapInfoTaskbarMode( UINT16 usNewMode )
00295 {
00296       BOOLEAN fShowExitGrids = FALSE;
00297       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_ADD_LIGHT1_SOURCE );
00298       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_DRAW_EXITGRIDS );
00299       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_NORTH_POINT );
00300       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_WEST_POINT );
00301       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_CENTER_POINT );
00302       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_EAST_POINT );
00303       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_SOUTH_POINT );
00304       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_ISOLATED_POINT );
00305       ClickEditorButton( usNewMode );
00306       switch( usNewMode )
00307       {
00308             case MAPINFO_ADD_LIGHT1_SOURCE:
00309                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_LIGHT;
00310                   break;
00311             case MAPINFO_DRAW_EXITGRIDS:
00312                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID;
00313                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedSelectionType;
00314                   fShowExitGrids = TRUE;
00315                   break;
00316             case MAPINFO_NORTH_POINT:
00317                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_NORTHPOINT;
00318                   break;
00319             case MAPINFO_WEST_POINT:
00320                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_WESTPOINT;
00321                   break;
00322             case MAPINFO_EAST_POINT:
00323                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_EASTPOINT;
00324                   break;
00325             case MAPINFO_SOUTH_POINT:
00326                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_SOUTHPOINT;
00327                   break;
00328             case MAPINFO_CENTER_POINT:
00329                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_CENTERPOINT;
00330                   break;
00331             case MAPINFO_ISOLATED_POINT:
00332                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ISOLATEDPOINT;
00333                   break;
00334             case MAPINFO_RADIO_NORMAL:
00335                   SetEditorSmoothingMode( SMOOTHING_NORMAL );
00336                   gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00337                   break;
00338             case MAPINFO_RADIO_BASEMENT:
00339                   SetEditorSmoothingMode( SMOOTHING_BASEMENT );
00340                   gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00341                   break;
00342             case MAPINFO_RADIO_CAVES:
00343                   SetEditorSmoothingMode( SMOOTHING_CAVES );
00344                   gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00345                   break;
00346       }
00347       if( fShowExitGrids )
00348       { 
00349             ShowExitGrids();
00350       }
00351       else
00352       { 
00353             HideExitGrids();
00354       }
00355 }

00357 
00358 void SetEditorSmoothingMode( UINT8 ubNewMode )
00359 {
00360       UnclickEditorButtons( MAPINFO_RADIO_NORMAL, MAPINFO_RADIO_CAVES );
00361       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS )
00362             HideEditorButtons( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM, BUILDING_CAVE_DRAWING );
00363       gfBasement = FALSE;
00364       gfCaves = FALSE;
00365       gMapInformation.ubEditorSmoothingType = SMOOTHING_NORMAL;
00366       switch( ubNewMode )
00367       {
00368             case SMOOTHING_NORMAL:
00369                   ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_RADIO_NORMAL );
00370                   if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS )
00371                         ShowEditorButtons( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM, BUILDING_MOVE_BUILDING );
00372                   EnableEditorButtons( BUILDING_SMART_WALLS, BUILDING_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS );
00373                   break;
00374             case SMOOTHING_BASEMENT:
00375                   gfBasement = TRUE;
00376                   ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_RADIO_BASEMENT );
00377                   if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS )
00378                         ShowEditorButtons( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM, BUILDING_KILL_BUILDING );
00379                   EnableEditorButtons( BUILDING_SMART_WALLS, BUILDING_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS );
00380                   break;
00381             case SMOOTHING_CAVES:
00382                   gfCaves = TRUE;
00383                   ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_RADIO_CAVES );
00384                   if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS )
00385                         ShowEditorButton( BUILDING_CAVE_DRAWING );
00386                   DisableEditorButtons( BUILDING_SMART_WALLS, BUILDING_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS );
00387                   break;
00388             default:
00389                   AssertMsg( 0, "Attempting to set an illegal smoothing mode." );
00390                   break;
00391       }
00392       gMapInformation.ubEditorSmoothingType = ubNewMode;
00393 }
